title: is having a offensive name even bannable
body: just wondering, i come across a lot. (also theyre usually toxic)

replies.body:
Usually, the only punishment is a force name change. In the case of no tolerance language, so names with stuff like hate speech, I believe they do issue 14 day bans, but possibly not for 1st offence.

In the case of a player using those forced name changes to keep making the same name but with special characters/slight variations or to make other equally bad names, they will also usually be issued further punishment.

> [{quoted}](name=Seras Dragon,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=V0nmqLmz,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2019-02-18T05:25:37.466+0000)

> In the case of a player using those forced name changes to keep making the same name but with special characters/slight variations or to make other equally bad names, they will also usually be issued further punishment.

My name was this in full originally. I got the forced name change back before the oce region existed. Can I still be reported for an offensive name? Would be good to know.. otherwise I'll leave it.

Honestly, I don't think even "ThatsBullshit" would get flagged on OCE. "ThatsBS" is ambiguous enough to be a non-issue in my mind, and I would say that's true on NA as well.  Of course, I can't make any guarantees, but I can't see your current name ever being a problem. 

Certainly, it's not something that would get you a punishment beyond the name change itself.
Thanks, sounds a bit more reassuring.
